condition: Herbal page. Standard herbal-section layout with plant illustration and surrounding text.

layout.description: Herbal page with plant illustration and text wrapping around it. Six lines of text, single text block.

key_readings: otrol (from EVA otol, L4 and L6) = treat-oil -- ot->otr operator + ol suffix, appears twice
dain (from EVA daiin, L1/L3/L4/L5) = given/substance -- high-frequency confirmed morpheme
hotrain (from EVA chotaiin, L5) = cook-treat-substance -- ch->h + t->tr + aiin->ain
otrhol (from EVA otchol, L5) = treat-cook-oil -- ot->otr + ch->h + ol suffix
validation_status.spatial_correlation: Herbal page with plant illustration. Text likely describes plant preparation.
notable_anomalies: otrol appears in both L4 and L6 -- repeated treated-oil reference anchors both lines
dairodg (L6) and ihoplor[?]dg (L2) contain unusual dg terminal sequences not seen elsewhere
Special glyph @S in L2 (s<!@S>y) is not part of normal script inventory

transcription_method: Direct paleographic reading from manuscript image using 7-layer constraint stack. EVA source: Takahashi (H=Hermes, primary).
